DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine TLK286 ( Telcyta ) effective gefitinib ( Iressa ) treatment non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study TLK286 ( Telcyta ) vs. Gefitinib Locally Advanced Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
